    • newChatMessage

      void newChatMessage(String playerName, String roomId, ChatMessage newMessage) throws RemoteException
      Asks server to add a new message to the room chat
      Parameters:
      playerName - Player who sent the message
      roomId - room of which the message has to be added
      newMessage - message to bed added to the ChatMessage List of the room
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception
